channel.title: CVE Feed for AiLux -- imx6 bundle
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AiLux -- imx6 bundle

item.title: CVE-2023-45592|2024-03-05T11:22:14.789Z -- ailux -- imx6%20bundle
item.description: A CWE-250 “Execution with Unnecessary Privileges” vulnerability in the embedded Chromium browser (due to the binary being executed with the “--no-sandbox” option and with root privileges) exacerbates the impacts of successful attacks executed against the browser. This issue affects: AiLux imx6 bundle below version imx6_1.0.7-2.
